myopenmath.statement:
The diameter of the pipe shown is 28.0 m. The diameter of the hole in the pipe is 20.0 m. Note the image is not to scale. How much metal is in this pipe? Round your answer to appropriately using the rules of significant figures. 28.0 m41.0 m20.0 m
The pipe is made of \displaystyle{m}^{{3}} of metal.
